    Getting Started with Brightcove Video Connect for the Drupal CMS

    This topic provides an overview of Brightcove Video Connect for the Drupal Content Management System.
    Plug-in Version Documentation Download Compatibility & Release Notes
    8.x-2.1

    Click Here

    		Plug-In Drupal 8.x


    Release Notes:

    • Added core media support and deprecate media_entity
    • Added support for PHP 7.3
    7.x-6.5
    Note: Brightcove will no longer support the 7.x-6.5 Drupal connector after 30 November 2021.
    		 Click Here Plug-In Drupal 7.x

     

    For help with this connector, please fill out this worksheet and include it with a support ticket to Brightcove customer support.
